SEARCH
Package application

Class ApplicationManager

java.lang.Object
application.ApplicationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicationManager
public class ApplicationManager extends Object implements IApplicationManager
Manages applications for BTO projects, including creating, retrieving, approving, and withdrawing applications. Applications are stored in a map where the key is the project name and the value is a set of applications for that project. This class interacts with IProjectManager and IUserManager to access project and user data.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationManager

      public ApplicationManager(IProjectManager projectManager, IUserManager userManager, IFileHandler fileHandler)
      Constructs an ApplicationManager with the necessary dependencies.
      Parameters:
      projectManager - the project manager to access project data
      userManager - the user manager to access user data
      fileHandler - the file handler to read application data from CSV

  • Method Details

    • loadApplicationFromCSV

      public void loadApplicationFromCSV()
      Loads applications from a CSV file into the application list. The CSV file is expected to have columns: projectName, nric, flatType, status.
      Specified by:
      loadApplicationFromCSV in interface IApplicationManager

    • saveApplicationtoCSV

      public void saveApplicationtoCSV()
      Saves the current application data to a CSV file. The CSV file will include the project name, applicant, flat type, and application status. The header row will be added at the beginning of the file.
      Specified by:
      saveApplicationtoCSV in interface IApplicationManager

    • createApplicationFromFile

      private Application createApplicationFromFile(String[] values)
      Helper function. Creates an Application object from a CSV row.
      Parameters:
      values - the array of values from a CSV row (projectName, nric, flatType, status)
      Returns:
      the created Application object, or null if the data is invalid

    • createApplication

      public void createApplication(User user, Project project, FlatType flatType)
      Creates a new application for a user and project.
      Specified by:
      createApplication in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      user - the user applying for the project (must be an Applicant)
      project - the project to apply for
      flatType - the flat type for the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is invalid, the project is invalid, or the user is an HDBOfficer managing the project

    • getApplicationsForUser

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getApplicationsForProject

      public List<Application> getApplicationsForProject(Project project)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific project.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationsForProject in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      project - the project to retrieve applications for
      Returns:
      a list of applications for the project, or an empty list if the project is null or has no applications

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • generateReport

      public List<String> generateReport(Optional<MaritalStatus> maritalStatus, Optional<FlatType> flatType, OptionalInt minAge, OptionalInt maxAge, Optional<String> projectName)
      Generate report with filters
      Specified by:
      generateReport in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      maritalStatus - used as filter for marital status
      flatType - used as filter for flat type
      minAge - used as filter for minimum age
      maxAge - used as filter for maximum age
      projectName - used as filter for project Name
      Returns:
      list of report strings matching the criteria
